mc.name: Phyrexian Negator
mc.oracleText:
Trample
Whenever Phyrexian Negator is dealt damage, sacrifice a permanent for each 1 damage dealt to it.
mc.printedText:
Trample
Whenever Phyrexian Negator is dealt damage, sacrifice a permanent for each 1 damage dealt to it.
mc.flavorText: They exist to cease.

mc.name: Treachery
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
When Treachery comes into play, untap up to five lands.
You control enchanted creature.
mc.printedText:
When Treachery comes into play, untap up to five lands.
You control enchanted creature.
mc.flavorText:
"The academy educates; I employ. It's a perfect arrangement."
--Gatha, Tolarian renegade

mc.name: Æther Sting
mc.oracleText: Whenever an opponent plays a creature spell, Æther Sting deals 1 damage to that player.
mc.printedText: Whenever one of your opponents plays a creature spell, Aether Sting deals 1 damage to that player.
mc.flavorText: When Gatha fell, he was called to account for each abomination he created.

mc.name: Plow Under
mc.oracleText: Put two target lands on top of their owner's library.
mc.printedText: Put two target lands on top of their owner's library.
mc.flavorText:
To renew the land, plow the land. To destroy the land, do nothing.
--Druids' saying

mc.name: Masticore
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may discard a card. If you don't, sacrifice Masticore.
{2}: Masticore deals 1 damage to target creature.
{2}: Regenerate Masticore.
mc.printedText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may choose and discard a card from your hand. If you don't, sacrifice Masticore.
{2}: Masticore deals 1 damage to target creature.
{2}: Regenerate Masticore.

mc.name: Landslide
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice any number of Mountains. Landslide deals that much damage to target player.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice any number of mountains. Landslide deals that much damage to target player.
mc.flavorText:
Sometimes the mountain takes.
--Keldon saying

mc.name: Apprentice Necromancer
mc.oracleText: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Apprentice Necromancer: Return target creature card from your graveyard to play. That creature gains haste. At end of turn, sacrifice it.
mc.printedText: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Apprentice Necromancer: Return target creature card from your graveyard to play. That creature gains haste. At end of turn, sacrifice it. (The creature may attack and {T} the turn it comes under your control.)

mc.name: Serra Advocate
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: An angel's touch can prepare a soldier for battle more than a thousand military drills.

mc.name: Wall of Glare
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Wall of Glare can block any number of creatures.
mc.printedText:
(Walls can't attack.)
Wall of Glare may block any number of creatures each combat.
mc.flavorText: The blinding barrier served Benalia better than a hundred shields.

mc.name: Field Surgeon
mc.oracleText: Tap an untapped creature you control: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
mc.printedText: Tap an untapped creature you control: Prevent the next 1 damage to target creature this turn.
mc.flavorText: Commanders order soldiers to attack. Field surgeons order them to heal. Both are obeyed without question.

mc.name: Reliquary Monk
mc.oracleText: When Reliquary Monk is put into a graveyard from play, destroy target artifact or enchantment.
mc.printedText: When Reliquary Monk is put into a graveyard from play, destroy target artifact or enchantment.
mc.flavorText: A thing of Serra's realm exists only by the grace of her followers' faith.

mc.name: Jasmine Seer
mc.oracleText: {2}{W}, {T}: Reveal any number of white cards in your hand. You gain 2 life for each card revealed this way.
mc.printedText: {2}{W}, {T}: Reveal any number of white cards in your hand. You gain 2 life for each card revealed this way.

mc.name: Capashen Knight
mc.oracleText:
First strike
{1}{W}: Capashen Knight gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
First strike
{1}{W}: Capashen Knight gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Few warriors dare to challenge a knight of Capashen. Should one do so, there is one fewer.

mc.name: Flicker
mc.oracleText: Remove target nontoken permanent from the game, then return it to play under its owner's control.
mc.printedText: Remove target nontoken permanent from the game, then return it to play under its owner's control.
mc.flavorText: Who is truer: you who are, or you who are to be?

mc.name: Mask of Law and Grace
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has protection from black and protection from red.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gains protection from black and protection from red.
mc.flavorText: The archangels zealously drove Serra's light into every corner of their new home as if their creator still commanded them.

mc.name: Voice of Reason
mc.oracleText: Flying, protection from blue
mc.printedText: Flying, protection from blue
mc.flavorText:
"Next to Grace is Reason, and Reason must be retained. If the web of Reason comes unwoven, madness will escape."
--Song of All, canto 167

mc.name: Voice of Duty
mc.oracleText: Flying, protection from green
mc.printedText: Flying, protection from green
mc.flavorText:
"Next to Law is Duty, and Duty must be obeyed. If the frame of Duty is broken, none shall weave life's fabric."
--Song of All, canto 167

mc.name: Scour
mc.oracleText: Remove target enchantment from the game. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that enchantment and remove them from the game. That player then shuffles his or her library.
mc.printedText: Remove target enchantment from the game. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all copies of that card and remove them from the game. That player then shuffles his or her library.

mc.name: Archery Training
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put an arrow counter on Archery Training.
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals X damage to target attacking or blocking creature, where X is the number of arrow counters on Archery Training."
mc.printedText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put an arrow counter on Archery Training.
Enchanted creature gains "{T}: This creature deals X damage to target attacking or blocking creature, where X is the number of arrow counters on the Archery Training enchanting this creature."

mc.name: Academy Rector
mc.oracleText: When Academy Rector is put into a graveyard from play, you may remove Academy Rector from the game. If you do, search your library for an enchantment card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: When Academy Rector is put into a graveyard from play, you may remove Academy Rector from the game. If you do, search your library for an enchantment card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Opalescence
mc.oracleText: Each other non-Aura enchantment is a creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost. It's still an enchantment.
mc.printedText: Each other global enchantment is a creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost. It's still an enchantment.

mc.name: Replenish
mc.oracleText: Return all enchantment cards from your graveyard to play. (Auras with nothing to enchant remain in your graveyard.)
mc.printedText: Return all enchantment cards from your graveyard to play. (Local enchantments with no permanent to enchant remain in your graveyard.)
mc.flavorText: Treasures, trinkets, trash--the relics of the past are brought forth again.

mc.name: Fledgling Osprey
mc.oracleText: Fledgling Osprey has flying as long as it's enchanted.
mc.printedText: Fledgling Osprey gains flying as long as it's enchanted.
mc.flavorText: It isn't truly born until its first flight.

mc.name: Blizzard Elemental
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{3}{U}: Untap Blizzard Elemental.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{3}{U}: Untap Blizzard Elemental.
mc.flavorText: Students who had seen Rayne argue with Urza were certain she had summoned it to make him seem warmer by comparison.

mc.name: Kingfisher
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Kingfisher is put into a graveyard from play, draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Kingfisher is put into a graveyard from play, draw a card.
mc.flavorText: It's tastiest when served with the fish it stole.

mc.name: Brine Seer
mc.oracleText: {2}{U}, {T}: Reveal any number of blue cards in your hand. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card revealed this way.
mc.printedText: {2}{U}, {T}: Reveal any number of blue cards in your hand. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card revealed this way.

mc.name: Telepathic Spies
mc.oracleText: When Telepathic Spies comes into play, look at target opponent's hand.
mc.printedText: When Telepathic Spies comes into play, look at target opponent's hand.
mc.flavorText: "Do try to keep an open mind, would you?"

mc.name: Disappear
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
{U}: Return enchanted creature and Disappear to their owners' hands.
mc.printedText: {U}: Return enchanted creature and Disappear to their owners' hands.
mc.flavorText: If at first you don't succeed, run away and hide.

mc.name: Rescue
mc.oracleText: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText:
"Urza, I've discovered more promising students than you and my husband have, combined. And I haven't lost a single one."
--Rayne, Academy Chancellor

mc.name: Thieving Magpie
mc.oracleText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever Thieving Magpie deals damage to an opponent, you draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Thieving Magpie deals damage to one of your opponents, you draw a card.
mc.flavorText: Rayne once made several unkind comparisons between the bird's naked opportunism and Urza's.

mc.name: Metathran Elite
mc.oracleText: Metathran Elite is unblockable as long as it's enchanted.
mc.printedText: Metathran Elite is unblockable as long as it's enchanted.
mc.flavorText: If the eyes are windows to the soul, their souls are not of this world.

mc.name: Mental Discipline
mc.oracleText: {1}{U}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
mc.printedText: {1}{U}, Choose and discard a card from your hand: Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: Barrin drowned his doubts about Urza's project by delving ever deeper into its details.

mc.name: Quash
mc.oracleText: Counter target instant or sorcery spell. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that spell and remove them from the game. That player then shuffles his or her library.
mc.printedText: Counter target instant or sorcery spell. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all copies of that card and remove them from the game. That player then shuffles his or her library.

mc.name: Private Research
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a page counter on Private Research.
When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, draw a card for each page counter on Private Research.
mc.printedText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a page counter on Private Research.
When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, draw a card for each page counter on Private Research.

mc.name: Opposition
mc.oracleText: Tap an untapped creature you control: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.
mc.printedText: Tap an untapped creature you control: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.
mc.flavorText:
"Urza says he's sane. Perhaps, but measures of sanity among planeswalkers are hard to come by."
--Barrin

mc.name: Iridescent Drake
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Iridescent Drake comes into play, put target Aura card from a graveyard into play attached to Iridescent Drake. (You control that Aura.)
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Iridescent Drake comes into play, return target enchant creature card from a graveyard to play enchanting Iridescent Drake. (You control that enchantment.)

mc.name: Rayne, Academy Chancellor
mc.oracleText: Whenever you or a permanent you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card, and if Rayne, Academy Chancellor is enchanted, you may draw another card.
mc.printedText: Whenever you or a permanent you control is the target of a spell or ability controlled by one of your opponents, you may draw a card, and if Rayne, Academy Chancellor is enchanted, you may draw another card.

mc.name: Donate
mc.oracleText: Target player gains control of target permanent you control.
mc.printedText: Target player gains control of target permanent you control.
mc.flavorText: Campus pranksters initiate new students with the old "beeble bomb" routine.

mc.name: Disease Carriers
mc.oracleText: When Disease Carriers is put into a graveyard from play, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: When Disease Carriers is put into a graveyard from play, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Rath is a disease all its inhabitants carry.

mc.name: Squirming Mass
mc.oracleText: Fear
mc.printedText: Squirming Mass can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and black creatures.
mc.flavorText: Only the coldest hearts and the strongest stomachs can stand against it.

mc.name: Ravenous Rats
mc.oracleText: When Ravenous Rats comes into play, target opponent discards a card.
mc.printedText: When Ravenous Rats comes into play, target opponent chooses and discards a card from his or her hand.
mc.flavorText:
"For all the priceless tomes they have destroyed, one would think they would taste better."
--Davvol, Evincar of Rath

mc.name: Nightshade Seer
mc.oracleText: {2}{B}, {T}: Reveal any number of black cards in your hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.
mc.printedText: {2}{B}, {T}: Reveal any number of black cards in your hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

mc.name: Encroach
mc.oracleText: Target player reveals his or her hand. Choose a nonbasic land card from it. That player discards that card.
mc.printedText: Look at target player's hand and choose a nonbasic land card from it. That player discards that card.
mc.flavorText:
"The rate of spread in this region is unacceptable. Start again."
--Davvol, Evincar of Rath

mc.name: Rapid Decay
mc.oracleText:
Remove from the game up to three target cards in a single graveyard.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Cycling {2}
Remove from the game up to three target cards in a single graveyard.
mc.flavorText: The grave robbers arrived the day after the burial. They were a day too late.

mc.name: Bubbling Muck
mc.oracleText: Until end of turn, whenever a player taps a Swamp for mana, its controller adds {B} to his or her mana pool.
mc.printedText: Until end of turn, whenever a player taps a swamp for mana, it produces an additional {B}.
mc.flavorText: The muck claims a hundred living things for each meager treasure it spews forth.

mc.name: Plague Dogs
mc.oracleText:
When Plague Dogs is put into a graveyard from play, all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
{2}, Sacrifice Plague Dogs: Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
When Plague Dogs is put into a graveyard from play, all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
{2}, Sacrifice Plague Dogs: Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: "They're not just retrievers, they're carriers."

mc.name: Dying Wail
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, target player discards two cards.
mc.printedText: When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard from play, target player chooses and discards two cards from his or her hand.
mc.flavorText: This is a world of spiteful wasps that sting and kill even as they die.

mc.name: Festering Wound
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put an infection counter on Festering Wound.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Festering Wound deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of infection counters on Festering Wound.
mc.printedText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put an infection counter on Festering Wound.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Festering Wound deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of infection counters on Festering Wound.

mc.name: Eradicate
mc.oracleText: Remove target nonblack creature from the game. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that creature and remove them from the game. That player then shuffles his or her library.
mc.printedText: Remove target nonblack creature from the game. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all copies of that card and remove them from the game. That player then shuffles his or her library.

mc.name: Body Snatcher
mc.oracleText:
When Body Snatcher comes into play, you may discard a creature card. If you don't, remove Body Snatcher from the game.
When Body Snatcher is put into a graveyard from play, remove Body Snatcher from the game and return target creature card from your graveyard to play.
mc.printedText:
When Body Snatcher comes into play, you may choose and discard a creature card from your hand. If you don't, remove Body Snatcher from the game.
When Body Snatcher is put into a graveyard from play, remove Body Snatcher from the game and return target creature card from your graveyard to play.

mc.name: Attrition
mc.oracleText: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonblack creature.
mc.printedText: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonblack creature.
mc.flavorText:
"I will trade life for life with the insurgents. Our resources, unlike theirs, are limitless."
--Davvol, Evincar of Rath

mc.name: Yawgmoth's Bargain
mc.oracleText:
Skip your draw step.

Pay 1 life: Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Skip your draw step.
Pay 1 life: Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: He craves only one commodity.

mc.name: Keldon Vandals
mc.oracleText:
Echo {2}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Keldon Vandals comes into play, destroy target artifact.
mc.printedText:
Echo
When Keldon Vandals comes into play, destroy target artifact.
mc.flavorText: Keldons divide all their spoils into two groups: trophies and catapult ammunition.

mc.name: Colos Yearling
mc.oracleText:
Mountainwalk
{R}: Colos Yearling gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Mountainwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a mountain.)
{R}: Colos Yearling gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: A steed grows with its rider.

mc.name: Hulking Ogre
mc.oracleText: Hulking Ogre can't block.
mc.printedText: Hulking Ogre can't block.
mc.flavorText:
"The Keldons' ogre campaign provided more body parts than my meager facility could properly use."
--Gatha, Tolarian renegade

mc.name: Goblin Gardener
mc.oracleText: When Goblin Gardener is put into a graveyard from play, destroy target land.
mc.printedText: When Goblin Gardener is put into a graveyard from play, destroy target land.
mc.flavorText: "Grow food in dirt? Save time--eat dirt."

mc.name: Wild Colos
mc.oracleText: Haste
mc.printedText: Haste (This creature may attack and {T} the turn it comes under your control.)
mc.flavorText: You'll never get a Keldon's goat.

mc.name: Cinder Seer
mc.oracleText: {2}{R}, {T}: Reveal any number of red cards in your hand. Cinder Seer deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.
mc.printedText: {2}{R}, {T}: Reveal any number of red cards in your hand. Cinder Seer deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

mc.name: Trumpet Blast
mc.oracleText: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Keldon warriors don't need signals to tell them when to attack, but when to stop.

mc.name: Flame Jet
mc.oracleText:
Flame Jet deals 3 damage to target player.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Cycling {2}
Flame Jet deals 3 damage to target player.
mc.flavorText: Did the land make the Keldons? Did the Keldons make the land? Or were they simply meant for each other?

mc.name: Goblin Masons
mc.oracleText: When Goblin Masons is put into a graveyard from play, destroy target Wall.
mc.printedText: When Goblin Masons is put into a graveyard from play, destroy target Wall.
mc.flavorText: "Goblins build with true zeal--and anything else within arm's reach."

mc.name: Mark of Fury
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has haste.
At end of turn, return Mark of Fury to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature gains haste. (It may attack and {T} the turn it comes under your control.)
At end of turn, return Mark of Fury to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: Many Keldon warriors bear the mark of intentional insanity.

mc.name: Reckless Abandon
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to play Reckless Abandon, sacrifice a creature.

Reckless Abandon deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText:
As an additional cost to play Reckless Abandon, sacrifice a creature.
Reckless Abandon deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: The climax of a warlord's career is always death.

mc.name: Keldon Champion
mc.oracleText:
Haste
Echo {2}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Keldon Champion comes into play, it deals 3 damage to target player.
mc.printedText:
Echo; haste (This creature may attack and {T} the turn it comes under your control.)
When Keldon Champion comes into play, it deals 3 damage to target player.

mc.name: Splinter
mc.oracleText: Remove target artifact from the game. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that artifact and remove them from the game. That player then shuffles his or her library.
mc.printedText: Remove target artifact from the game. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all copies of that card and remove them from the game. That player then shuffles his or her library.

mc.name: Incendiary
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a fuse counter on Incendiary.
When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, Incendiary deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of fuse counters on Incendiary.
mc.printedText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a fuse counter on Incendiary.
When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, Incendiary deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of fuse counters on Incendiary.

mc.name: Goblin Marshal
mc.oracleText:
Echo {4}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Goblin Marshal comes into play or is put into a graveyard from play, put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens into play.
mc.printedText:
Echo
Whenever Goblin Marshal comes into play or is put into a graveyard from play, put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens into play.

mc.name: Bloodshot Cyclops
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Bloodshot Cyclops deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Bloodshot Cyclops deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.
mc.flavorText: After their first encounter, the goblins named him Chuck.

mc.name: Repercussion
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, Repercussion deals that much damage to that creature's controller.
mc.printedText: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, Repercussion deals that much damage to that creature's controller.
mc.flavorText: Not all Keld's warriors are found on the battlefield.

mc.name: Impatience
mc.oracleText: At the end of each player's turn, if that player didn't play a spell that turn, Impatience deals 2 damage to him or her.
mc.printedText: At the end of each player's turn, if that player didn't play a spell that turn, Impatience deals 2 damage to him or her.
mc.flavorText: Ask a Keldon to hold his temper and you'll be left holding your guts.

mc.name: Wake of Destruction
mc.oracleText: Destroy target land and all other lands with the same name as that land.
mc.printedText: Destroy target land and all lands with the same name as that land.
mc.flavorText:
Land charred black, rivers boiled,
Crops and wells alike despoiled,
Mountains leveled, forests felled--
Footprints of the beasts of Keld.

mc.name: Hunting Moa
mc.oracleText:
Echo {2}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Hunting Moa comes into play or is put into a graveyard from play, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
mc.printedText:
Echo
Whenever Hunting Moa comes into play or is put into a graveyard from play, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

mc.name: Heart Warden
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
{2}, Sacrifice Heart Warden: Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add one green mana to your mana pool.
{2}, Sacrifice Heart Warden: Draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"In Llanowar, we tend the forest's boughs and branches. In Yavimaya, we are a part of them."
--Rofellos of Llanowar

mc.name: Taunting Elf
mc.oracleText: All creatures able to block Taunting Elf do so.
mc.printedText: All creatures able to block Taunting Elf do so.
mc.flavorText: Much to Multani's chagrin, Rofellos gleefully tutored Yavimaya's elves on the rudest and most vulgar words spoken in Llanowar.

mc.name: Marker Beetles
mc.oracleText:
When Marker Beetles is put into a graveyard from play, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{2}, Sacrifice Marker Beetles: Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
When Marker Beetles is put into a graveyard from play, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{2}, Sacrifice Marker Beetles: Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: In case of emergency, crush bug.

mc.name: Goliath Beetle
mc.oracleText: Trample
mc.printedText: Trample
mc.flavorText: The balance of nature dictates that one day humans will be stepped on by bugs.

mc.name: Ivy Seer
mc.oracleText: {2}{G}, {T}: Reveal any number of green cards in your hand. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.
mc.printedText: {2}{G}, {T}: Reveal any number of green cards in your hand. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

mc.name: Yavimaya Elder
mc.oracleText:
When Yavimaya Elder is put into a graveyard from play, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
{2}, Sacrifice Yavimaya Elder: Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
When Yavimaya Elder is put into a graveyard from play, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
{2}, Sacrifice Yavimaya Elder: Draw a card.

mc.name: Multani's Decree
mc.oracleText: Destroy all enchantments. You gain 2 life for each enchantment destroyed this way.
mc.printedText: Destroy all enchantments. You gain 2 life for each enchantment destroyed this way.
mc.flavorText:
"This is my place of power. Nothing can take root here unless I allow it."
--Multani, maro-sorcerer

mc.name: Gamekeeper
mc.oracleText: When Gamekeeper is put into a graveyard from play, you may remove Gamekeeper from the game. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card into play and put all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.
mc.printedText: When Gamekeeper is put into a graveyard from play, you may remove Gamekeeper from the game. If you do, reveal cards from your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card into play and put the other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

mc.name: Pattern of Rebirth
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, that creature's controller may search his or her library for a creature card and put that card into play. If that player does, he or she then shuffles his or her library.
mc.printedText: When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard from play, that creature's controller may search his or her library for a creature card and put that card into play. If that player does, he or she then shuffles his or her library.

mc.name: Momentum
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a growth counter on Momentum.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each growth counter on Momentum.
mc.printedText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a growth counter on Momentum.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each growth counter on Momentum.

mc.name: Yavimaya Enchantress
mc.oracleText: Yavimaya Enchantress gets +1/+1 for each enchantment in play.
mc.printedText: Yavimaya Enchantress gets +1/+1 for each enchantment in play.
mc.flavorText: From each seed, a world. From each world, a thousand seeds.

mc.name: Rofellos, Llanowar Emissary
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool for each Forest you control.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add one green mana to your mana pool for each forest you control.

mc.name: Thorn Elemental
mc.oracleText: You may have Thorn Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
mc.printedText: Thorn Elemental may deal its combat damage to defending player as though it weren't blocked.
mc.flavorText: Rain from this storm leaves you pinned to the ground like an insect.

mc.name: Elvish Piper
mc.oracleText: {G}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand into play.
mc.printedText: {G}, {T}: Put a creature card from your hand into play.
mc.flavorText:
From Gaea grew the world, and the world was silent. From Gaea grew the world's elves, and the world was silent no more.
--Elvish teaching

mc.name: Brass Secretary
mc.oracleText: {2}, Sacrifice Brass Secretary: Draw a card.
mc.printedText: {2}, Sacrifice Brass Secretary: Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: The students disliked the secretary for its unfailing memory--until they discovered it couldn't dodge thrown objects.

mc.name: Metalworker
mc.oracleText: {T}: Reveal any number of artifact cards in your hand. Add {2} to your mana pool for each card revealed this way.
mc.printedText: {T}: Reveal any number of artifact cards in your hand. Add two colorless mana to your mana pool for each card revealed this way.
mc.flavorText:
"At this rate I fully expect to be replaced by a clockwork golem by year's end."
--Barrin

mc.name: Mantis Engine
mc.oracleText:
{2}: Mantis Engine gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{2}: Mantis Engine gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
mc.printedText:
{2}: Mantis Engine gains flying until end of turn.
{2}: Mantis Engine gains first strike until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Tawnos left a legacy of animal designs in many of Urza's creations.

mc.name: Thran Dynamo
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add {3} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add three colorless mana to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: Urza's metathran children were conceived, birthed, and nurtured by an integrated system of machines.

mc.name: Braidwood Cup
mc.oracleText: {T}: You gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: {T}: You gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText:
"I think it no accident that every civilized people has discovered the art of distillation."
--Rofellos of Llanowar

mc.name: Fodder Cannon
mc.oracleText: {4}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Fodder Cannon deals 4 damage to target creature.
mc.printedText: {4}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Fodder Cannon deals 4 damage to target creature.
mc.flavorText:
Step 1: Find your cousin.
Step 2: Get your cousin in the cannon.
Step 3: Find another cousin.

mc.name: Braidwood Sextant
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Braidwood Sextant: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Braidwood Sextant: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Caltrops
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature attacks, Caltrops deals 1 damage to it.
mc.printedText: Whenever a creature attacks, Caltrops deals 1 damage to it.
mc.flavorText: Toward the end, Gatha struggled to keep his experiments in and his patrons out.

mc.name: Thran Golem
mc.oracleText: As long as Thran Golem is enchanted, it gets +2/+2 and has flying, first strike, and trample.
mc.printedText: As long as Thran Golem is enchanted, it gets +2/+2 and gains flying, first strike, and trample.
mc.flavorText: Karn felt more secure about his value to Urza when he realized he didn't need regular trimming.

mc.name: Extruder
mc.oracleText:
Echo {4} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
Sacrifice an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
mc.printedText:
Echo
Sacrifice an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
mc.flavorText: As the invasion drew closer, Urza's means began to resemble Phyrexia's end.

mc.name: Junk Diver
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Junk Diver is put into a graveyard from play, return another target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Junk Diver is put into a graveyard from play, return another target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText: Garbage in, treasure out.

mc.name: Urza's Incubator
mc.oracleText:
As Urza's Incubator comes into play, choose a creature type.

Creature spells of the chosen type cost {2} less to play.
mc.printedText:
When Urza's Incubator comes into play, choose a creature type.
Creature spells of the chosen type cost {2} less to play.
mc.flavorText:
"Stop thinking like an artificer, Urza, and start thinking like a father"
--Rayne, Academy Chancellor

mc.name: Powder Keg
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a fuse counter on Powder Keg.

{T}, Sacrifice Powder Keg: Destroy each artifact and creature with converted mana cost equal to the number of fuse counters on Powder Keg.
mc.printedText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a fuse counter on Powder Keg.
{T}, Sacrifice Powder Keg: Destroy each artifact and creature with converted mana cost equal to the number of fuse counters on Powder Keg.

mc.name: Storage Matrix
mc.oracleText: As long as Storage Matrix is untapped, each player chooses artifact, creature, or land during his or her untap step. That player can untap only permanents of the chosen type this step.
mc.printedText: As long as Storage Matrix is untapped, instead of each player untapping the permanents he or she controls during his or her untap step, that player chooses artifacts, creatures, or lands and untaps all permanents of the chosen type he or she controls.

mc.name: Aura Thief
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Aura Thief is put into a graveyard from play, you gain control of all enchantments. (You don't get to move Auras.)
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Aura Thief is put into a graveyard from play, you gain control of all enchantments. (You don't get to move local enchantments.)
mc.flavorText: Illusion steals reality from the unwise.

mc.name: Scrying Glass
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: Choose a number greater than 0 and a color. Target opponent reveals his or her hand. If that opponent reveals exactly the chosen number of cards of the chosen color, you draw a card.
mc.printedText: {3}, {T}: Choose a number greater than 0 and a color. Target opponent reveals his or her hand. If that opponent reveals exactly the chosen number of cards of the chosen color, you draw a card.

mc.name: Scent of Jasmine
mc.oracleText: Reveal any number of white cards in your hand. You gain 2 life for each card revealed this way.
mc.printedText: Reveal any number of white cards in your hand. You gain 2 life for each card revealed this way.

mc.name: Scent of Cinder
mc.oracleText: Reveal any number of red cards in your hand. Scent of Cinder deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.
mc.printedText: Reveal any number of red cards in your hand. Scent of Cinder deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

mc.name: Scent of Nightshade
mc.oracleText: Reveal any number of black cards in your hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.
mc.printedText: Reveal any number of black cards in your hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

mc.name: Scent of Brine
mc.oracleText: Reveal any number of blue cards in your hand. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card revealed this way.
mc.printedText: Reveal any number of blue cards in your hand. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card revealed this way.

mc.name: Scent of Ivy
mc.oracleText: Reveal any number of green cards in your hand. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.
mc.printedText: Reveal any number of green cards in your hand. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

mc.name: Capashen Templar
mc.oracleText: {W}: Capashen Templar gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {W}: Capashen Templar gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Their shields are Benalia's outermost battlements.

mc.name: Fend Off
mc.oracleText:
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target creature this turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Cycling {2}
Target creature deals no combat damage this turn.
mc.flavorText: The best defense is to not get hit.

mc.name: Solidarity
mc.oracleText: Creatures you control get +0/+5 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Creatures you control get +0/+5 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Their commitment to Serra is as solid as any shield.

mc.name: False Prophet
mc.oracleText: When False Prophet is put into a graveyard from play, remove all creatures from the game.
mc.printedText: When False Prophet is put into a graveyard from play, remove all creatures from the game.
mc.flavorText: "You lived for Serra's love. Will you not die for it?"

mc.name: Soul Feast
mc.oracleText: Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.
mc.printedText: Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.
mc.flavorText: As no one has ever accepted a second invitation to Davvol's table, the evincar often dines alone.

mc.name: Chime of Night
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
When Chime of Night is put into a graveyard from play, destroy target nonblack creature.
mc.printedText: When Chime of Night is put into a graveyard from play, destroy target nonblack creature.
mc.flavorText: Many sent to serve Davvol carried such instruments, as if to remind him who their true masters were.

mc.name: Tethered Griffin
mc.oracleText:
Flying

When you control no enchantments, sacrifice Tethered Griffin.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When you control no enchantments, sacrifice Tethered Griffin.
mc.flavorText: Poorly trained griffins sometimes attack the noble audiences that gather to watch their progress.

mc.name: Covetous Dragon
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When you control no artifacts, sacrifice Covetous Dragon.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When you control no artifacts, sacrifice Covetous Dragon.
mc.flavorText: Gatha survived as long as he did by giving all Keld's predators exactly what they wanted.

mc.name: Goblin Festival
mc.oracleText: {2}: Goblin Festival deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Flip a coin. If you lose the flip, choose one of your opponents. That player gains control of Goblin Festival.
mc.printedText: {2}: Goblin Festival deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Flip a coin. If you lose the flip, choose one of your opponents. That player gains control of Goblin Festival.
mc.flavorText: "What are we celebratin' again?"

mc.name: Yavimaya Hollow
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{G}, {T}: Regenerate target creature.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool.
{G}, {T}: Regenerate target creature.
mc.flavorText: For all its traps and defenses, Yavimaya has its havens, too.

mc.name: Emperor Crocodile
mc.oracleText: When you control no other creatures, sacrifice Emperor Crocodile.
mc.printedText: When you control no other creatures, sacrifice Emperor Crocodile.
mc.flavorText: The king of Yavimaya's waters pays constant attention to his subjects . . . and thrives on their adulation.

mc.name: Bubbling Beebles
mc.oracleText: Bubbling Beebles is unblockable as long as defending player controls an enchantment.
mc.printedText: Bubbling Beebles is unblockable as long as defending player controls an enchantment.
mc.flavorText:
"Chancellor Rayne canceled the annual beeble roast. I should have married a crueler woman."
--Barrin

mc.name: Sigil of Sleep
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a player, return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a player, return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: Arrows are only one way to remove an enemy.

mc.name: Slinking Skirge
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{2}, Sacrifice Slinking Skirge: Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{2}, Sacrifice Slinking Skirge: Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: Davvol encouraged the skirges; they made excellent sentries and were quite edible if properly seasoned.

mc.name: Skittering Horror
mc.oracleText: When you play a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Horror.
mc.printedText: When you play a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Horror.
mc.flavorText:
"This monstrosity will do--for now."
--Davvol, Evincar of Rath

mc.name: Magnify
mc.oracleText: All creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: All creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The seed torches' pollen gives off light, but the elves find it heightens their senses as well.

mc.name: Sanctimony
mc.oracleText: Whenever an opponent taps a Mountain for mana, you may gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever one of your opponents taps a mountain for mana, you may gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText: "To forgive our enemies is to forgive ourselves."

mc.name: Master Healer
mc.oracleText: {T}: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Prevent the next 4 damage to target creature or player this turn.
mc.flavorText: Behind his eyes is the pain of every soldier his hands have healed.

mc.name: Temporal Adept
mc.oracleText: {U}{U}{U}, {T}: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: {U}{U}{U}, {T}: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText:
"Of course she's at the head of her class. All her classmates have disappeared."
--Gatha, Tolarian renegade

mc.name: Goblin Berserker
mc.oracleText: First strike, haste
mc.printedText: First strike; haste (This creature may attack and {T} the turn it comes under your control.)
mc.flavorText: Goblins don't know the meaning of the word "tactics"--or the word "meaning," for that matter.

mc.name: Rofellos's Gift
mc.oracleText: Reveal any number of green cards in your hand. Return an enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand for each card revealed this way.
mc.printedText: Reveal any number of green cards in your hand. Return an enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand for each card revealed this way.
mc.flavorText:
"Rise, elf. We are both of Gaea, and thus we are equal."
--Multani, to Rofellos

mc.name: Compost
mc.oracleText: Whenever a black card is put into an opponent's graveyard, you may draw a card.
mc.printedText: Whenever a black card is put into one of your opponents' graveyards, you may draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
A fruit must rot before its seed can sprout.
--Yavimaya saying

mc.name: Ancient Silverback
mc.oracleText: {G}: Regenerate Ancient Silverback. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
mc.printedText: {G}: Regenerate Ancient Silverback.
mc.flavorText: The Phyrexian killing machines couldn't have known the seriousness of their mistake in wounding the ape--they'd never seen it angry.

mc.name: Tormented Angel
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: Falling from heaven is not as painful as surviving the impact.

mc.name: Capashen Standard
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
{2}, Sacrifice Capashen Standard: Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
{2}, Sacrifice Capashen Standard: Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: Benalia has no need for peacocks to serve as symbols of vanity. The Capashens strut more proudly than any bird.

mc.name: Metathran Soldier
mc.oracleText: Metathran Soldier is unblockable.
mc.printedText: Metathran Soldier is unblockable.
mc.flavorText: Just as Serra crafted angels of light and faith, Urza constructed an army of sorcery and power to resist the coming invasion.

mc.name: Illuminated Wings
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
{2}, Sacrifice Illuminated Wings: Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature gains flying.
{2}, Sacrifice Illuminated Wings: Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: For a moment, Urza thought not of war and destruction, but of the freedom of the skies.

mc.name: Fatigue
mc.oracleText: Target player skips his or her next draw step.
mc.printedText: Target player skips his or her next draw step.
mc.flavorText: "Mind if I just lie down right here for a few weeks?"

mc.name: Elvish Lookout
mc.oracleText: Shroud (This permanent can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
mc.printedText: Elvish Lookout can't be the target of spells or abilities.
mc.flavorText: Like a masterful quilter, Yavimaya stitches together patches of color to warn its denizens of threats.

mc.name: Thran Foundry
mc.oracleText: {1}, {T}, Remove Thran Foundry from the game: Target player shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.
mc.printedText: {1}, {T}, Remove Thran Foundry from the game: Target player shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.
mc.flavorText:
"What we do not use up, we use again."
--Urza

mc.name: Phyrexian Monitor
mc.oracleText: {B}: Regenerate Phyrexian Monitor.
mc.printedText: {B}: Regenerate Phyrexian Monitor.
mc.flavorText: Being one would be an honor, if the word "honor" had any meaning in Phyrexia.

mc.name: Twisted Experiment
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/-1.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gets +3/-1.
mc.flavorText: Gatha showed remarkable prowess in increasing his subjects' stature. Their lifespans, however, were another matter.

mc.name: Carnival of Souls
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature comes into play, you lose 1 life and add {B} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: Whenever a creature comes into play, you lose 1 life and add {B} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: "--'Davvol, blast those elves.' --'Davvol, transport those troops.' No one cares that today is my birthday."

mc.name: Lurking Jackals
mc.oracleText: When an opponent has 10 life or less, if Lurking Jackals is an enchantment, it becomes a 3/2 Hound creature.
mc.printedText: When one of your opponents has 10 life or less, if Lurking Jackals is an enchantment, it becomes a 3/2 Hound creature.
mc.flavorText: Often it's not the hunter or the hunted but the opportunist who thrives in Rath.

mc.name: Plated Spider
mc.oracleText: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText: Plated Spider may block as though it had flying.
mc.flavorText: Most spiders wait patiently for their prey to arrive. Most spiders aren't forty feet tall.

mc.name: Sowing Salt
mc.oracleText: Remove target nonbasic land from the game. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that land and remove them from the game. That player then shuffles his or her library.
mc.printedText: Remove target nonbasic land from the game. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all copies of that card and remove them from the game. That player then shuffles his or her library.
